鴖字的基本解释

鴖
mín
古书上说的一种红嘴鸟，形状像翠鸟。

鴖字的汉语字典释义

[①]［mín］
［《玉篇》音珉］
鸟名。

鴖字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鴖； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1485第13
【玉篇】音珉。鳥名。【山海經】符禺山鳥多鴖，似翠赤喙，可以禦火。又【集韻】無分切，音文。鴖母，鳥名。

鴖字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
鴖字的起名意思

暂无。

Cheng
Basic explanation of words
Cheng
mín
A red-billed bird described in ancient books, shaped like a kingfisher.
Cheng
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［mín］
["Jade Pian" Yin Min]
The name of the bird.
Cheng
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鴖; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 1485 No. 13
[Jade articles] Yin Min. The name of the bird. [Shanhaijing] Fuyu mountain birds are numerous, resembling a green beak, which can protect against fire. Also 【Jiyun】no segmentation, phonetic text.鴖母, the name of the bird.
